plays.text: Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Sillinger
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Tripping Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for High Sticking Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for High Sticking Ray Whitney
Goal scored by Grant Marshall assisted by Jaroslav Spacek and Ray Whitney
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Marc Denis
Goal scored by Ray Whitney assisted by Andrew Cassels and Rick Nash
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Jeff Jillson
Goal scored by Ray Whitney unassisted
Penalty to Scott Lachance 2 minutes for Crosschecking Adam Graves
Goal scored by Adam Graves assisted by Niklas Sundstrom
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Scott Hannan and Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Hannes Hyvonen assisted by Andrew Cassels and Geoff Sanderson
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Tripping Matt Bradley
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Marco Sturm and Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Ricci
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Jeff Jillson and Mike Rathje
